Privacy Policy

STI Merit Calculator

Effective Date:

This Privacy Policy applies to the STI Merit Calculator app (hereby referred to as "Application") created by SHEHZAD ALI (hereby referred to as "Service Provider") as a Free service. This service is intended for use "AS IS".

We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy details our practices regarding data collection, use, and disclosure.

Zero Data Collection Policy

We do not collect, store, use, or share any personal information.

The Application processes all data (such as marks and merit calculations) locally on your device. No data is transmitted to external servers, and no data is sold to third parties.

Information Collection and Use

Since we do not collect any personal information, we do not use your data for any purpose other than the local functionality of the app (calculating merit).

  • We do not collect your name, email, or phone number.
  • We do not collect your device ID or IP address.
  • We do not use cookies or tracking technologies.
  • We do not use third-party analytics services that track user behavior.

Security

We value your trust in using our Application. Since we do not collect any personal information, your data remains 100% secure on your own device. We do not maintain any external databases containing user information.
